description: She is a short, sporty and athletic girl who can beat anyone at sports. Although she generally does not have desires, when she finds a goal, she is able to single-mindely pursue it. Although she is generally a calm person, she is nyctophobia. She is very innocent, often being stopped by her friends from undressing in public in front of boys. She tomboy and refers to herself in a very masculine way as she uses the male-singular pronoun "boku" (åƒ•) to refer to herself and always dresses in boys clothing except during the epilogue of the anime. Her number on the class list is 17.
name: Hirakawa Natsumi
